dmca.title: Insultmonger Demands Removal of Insulting Website
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

Ref: Infringement Notification

With regard to indentifying "in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that [I] believe has been infringed", all of the text insults on the site http://www.becauseyouareacunt.com are stolen from my site, Insultmonger.com, including the scripts used to generate insults. It is pointless listing the search results for this text because every single line (thousands of them) are property stolen from my site. However, for an example, this insult returns the violating site as No1:

http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&q= % 22You+could+type+every+thing+you +know+on+the+subject+on+back+of+a+microscopic+postage+stamp +and+still+have+room+leftover+for+a+shopping+list&btnG=Search

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Regards,

/[Private]/ 
Insultmonger Webmaster 
[Private]@[Private].com
